entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
